Articles.Content: I know this is probably a stupid question.....I'm trying to build my first rover I want to attach it to a rocket I've already used for many flights. When I build this rover in the hanger and save it I can not figure out how to load it to attach to my rocket.....Please Help
Save it as a sub-assembly, they are available in both the SPH and VAB. Remember that you will only be able to attach it using the original connection-point - the root part needs to have one free.
